Hey | Vine & Fig

In April 2020 I joined the leadership team of Vine & Fig, an international online community for queer Catholics. I remember when I first found their website, hopeful and lonely about having begun to remember how much the Catholic Church feels like home, despite every single thing.

At Vine & Fig, I was involved in social media for a while, and I facilitated live events. In the beginning of 2022 I pivoted away from social media, realizing how much it‚Äôs begun to feel like work. Now, I only focus on facilitation and gathering.
Last updated on November 7, 2022

I'm Zinzy Waleson. a person on the Internet and in Amsterdam. This is my website, which is a vastly personal project.
